link_desc:
libzbxhaproxy is natively compiled Zabbix agent loadable module The module enables discovery and present HAProxy servers stats and general information. A preconfigured Zabbix Template is also included in the project

The module extends Zabbix agent functionality with keys:

  • haproxy.discovery[] - discovering all exists HAProxy servers

  • haproxy.info[,,,] - present general information of HAProxy instance, such as Version, Uptime, etc

  • haproxy.stat[,,,] - present stats of HAProxy servers
author: k1nky
